mapper.select: select id, out_num, type, operator, create_time, product_number, consumer_id, remark, status, priority from biz_out_stock where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into biz_out_stock(out_num, type, operator, create_time, product_number, consumer_id, remark, status, priority) values (#{outNum}, #{type}, #{operator}, #{createTime}, #{productNumber}, #{consumerId}, #{remark}, #{status}, #{priority})

insert into biz_out_stock(out_num, type, operator, create_time, product_number, consumer_id, remark, status, priority) values
(#{entity.outNum}, #{entity.type}, #{entity.operator}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.productNumber}, #{entity.consumerId}, #{entity.remark}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.priority})

insert into biz_out_stock(out_num, type, operator, create_time, product_number, consumer_id, remark, status, priority) values
(#{entity.outNum}, #{entity.type}, #{entity.operator}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.productNumber}, #{entity.consumerId}, #{entity.remark}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.priority})
on duplicate key update out_num = values(out_num), type = values(type), operator = values(operator), create_time = values(create_time), product_number = values(product_number), consumer_id = values(consumer_id), remark = values(remark), status = values(status), priority = values(priority)
mapper.update:
update biz_out_stock
out_num = #{outNum},
type = #{type},
operator = #{operator},
create_time = #{createTime},
product_number = #{productNumber},
consumer_id = #{consumerId},
remark = #{remark},
status = #{status},
priority = #{priority},
where id = #{id}
